Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Admins will be able to define rules to automate agent lifecycle management.
Description:
Admins will have the ability to set up rules for various scenarios, such as - 1. Auto block risky agents. 2. Auto publish agents that meet a criterion. 3. Auto install agents that meet a criterion. . #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: November CY2025
